ProductInfo.Features:
Ultra-Thin - Slim and compact so it disappears in your pocket when not in use.
Fully Unlocked - Works on all four main GSM frequency bands for great reception world wide.
Bluetooth allows the phone to communicate without devices, such as hands free headsets, wirelessly-a great solution for people constantly on the move. It also provides a safe and easy way to have a phone conversation while driving.
Easy-to-use and responsive touchscreen allows for smooth navigating. No more do you have to worry about trying to press all those tiny little buttons - Touchscreen will make using your phone a breeze!
A built-in FM tuner lets you tune into your favorite radio station wherever you are - great for chilling out and relaxing to some music whenever you feel like taking a break from the daily grind.
ProductInfo.Name: VIP Quad Band Ultra Thin Flat Touch Screen Watch Phone (GIFT Bluetooth Headset and 4GB TF Card)
